div.p: Flag_of_Armenia.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 1,200 × 600 pixels, file size: 277 B)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: top; padding-right: 0.4em; width: 15%
background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; white-space: nowrap

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr;

p.i: LAW ON COPYRIGHT AND NEIGHBORING RIGHTS - full text (.pdf)

td.p:
Article 6. Works which are not considered as an object of copyright
The following are not an object of Copyright:

ul.li: communications on daily news or on current events that are press information;
official documents (laws, decisions, decrees, etc.) as well as their official translations;
state emblems and signs (flags, coats of arms (armorial bearings), medals (decorations), monetary signs, etc.);
results obtained by technical means without the intervention of human creative activity.

dl.dd: Copyright shall not extend to ideas, principles, methods, ceremonies (rituals), procedures, views (viewpoints), systems, proposed solutions, and discoveries of objectively existing phenomena.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction:ltr;

td.span: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

span.small: This tag does not indicate the copyright status or the source of the attached work. A normal copyright tag and a source are still required. See Commons:Licensing for more information.

p.span: Alemannisch | Boarisch | Български | Català | Česky | Dansk | Deutsch | Ελληνικά | English | Esperanto | Español | Eesti | Euskara | Suomi | Français | Hrvatski | Magyar | Bahasa Indonesia | Italiano | 日本語 | ქართული | 한국어 | Lietuvių | Македонски | മലയാളം | Plattdüütsch | Nederlands | Polski | Português | Română | Русский | ไทย | Українська | Vèneto | Tiếng Việt | 中文 | ‪中文(简体)‬ | ‪中文(繁體)‬ | 粵語 | +/−

td.span: (colours back to as they are at http://www.gov.am/enversion/armenia/flag.htm)

td.span: (switching to colors used at gov.am and various other places both official and unoffical)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 21:20, 29 November 2005

td.span: (more accurate stripe positioning. Changes are PD.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:05, 27 September 2005
